_sText:
///Surf_Slippery_Slope\\\
This is a map meant to have the theme of a ski/snowboard hotel/resort.
This is a high speed, medium skill level, surf map.
This map is full of easter eggs/secrets that can be found
This map I highly reccomend for rpg servers, or dm servers, or basically any gamemode administrators would like to use it for.

///Secrets\\\
There is a secret teleporter inside jail that leads to top.
There is a secret teleporter on both sides right out of spawn that leads to top
There are random secret teleporters all over the map all leading to top.

///Whats uneque about the map?\\\
This map has a jail in the middle of spawn
The ramps are smooth, and shaped like giant berms
It goes down a slippery slope :D

///Have Fun!\\\
